memberdef.name: CLASSES
memberdef.initializer: = $.fn.treeview.classes = { open: "open", closed: "closed", expandable: "expandable", expandableHitarea: "expandable-hitarea", lastExpandableHitarea: "lastExpandable-hitarea", collapsable: "collapsable", collapsableHitarea: "collapsable-hitarea", lastCollapsableHitarea: "lastCollapsable-hitarea", lastCollapsable: "lastCollapsable", lastExpandable: "lastExpandable", last: "last", hitarea: "hitarea" }
